text: Welcome. What is the content team?

text: The content/blog writing team for this organization if there is any

text: It’s fairly distributed. One central point is the website: <https://github.com/JuliaLang/www.julialang.org> … but there are also many other package and org websites, blogs, documentation, and more…

elements.text: It’s fairly distributed. One central point is the website:
… but there are also many other package and org websites, blogs, documentation, and more…

text: This <https://julialang.org/blog/2019/02/julia-entities/> has a useful overview of Julia, and this <https://julialang.org/community/>  is a good overview of community activity.

attachments.title: The Julia Project and Its Entities
attachments.text: The Julia Project and Its Entities | There are a number of entities surrounding the Julia programming language. Understandably, many people are not entirely clear on what these groups are and what their relationship to each other is. It’s pretty hard to know about these things without being in the thick of it. In this blog post I’ll...
